definition: abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning
give me liberty or give me death
pinyin: bu4 zi4 you2 , wu2 ning4 si3

sentences.english: Three generations of hereditary patriarchal system is rather profound social basis of Confucian culture.
sentences.chinese: 三代遗传的宗法制度毋宁是儒家文化的深厚社会基础。

sentences.english: That is not too bad a new year resolution.
sentences.chinese: 看春晚，毋宁死，也许这是个不错的新年新立志。

sentences.english: He is not so much a writer as a reporter.
sentences.chinese: 他与其说是个作家，毋宁说是个记者。

sentences.english: Who said 'Give me Liberty, or give me Death?'
sentences.chinese: 是谁说过”不自由，毋宁死“？”

definition: high sounding and impractical/high flown nonsense
to propose/to put forward (an idea)/to initiate
appearing to be praising others while actually praising yourself/one's criticism of others exposes one's own faults

lit. Ying writes a letter and Yan reads it/fig. to misinterpret the original meaning/to pile up errors/refers to the letter from capital 郢[Ying3] of 楚[Chu3] in which the inadvertent words "hold up the candle" are mistaken by the minister of 燕[Yan1] as "promote the wise"
to continue the same old routine/to carry on just as before/to procrastinate
